description:
Director of Data Science – Part Time / Contract (Remote)

About us:
Epitome Talent Advisors provides the most comprehensive candidate interview preparation available. Our award-winning advisors spent decades recruiting and building high-performance recruiting teams for some of the most successful companies in the world. They realized the incredible cost of qualified candidates failing interviews because they weren't prepared. Data showed how critical it was that candidates were prepared for the process and confident they could showcase their skills.

Based on thousands of successful hires, Epitome’s founders created the candidate prep programs for some of the most demanding interview processes on the planet. They have now expanded on those best practices using new, innovative techniques to revolutionize the world of candidate prep.

We're now expanding our network of partners to help deliver this training at scale to any job seeker that wants to ensure they are the most prepared candidate on the market.

About you:
We are looking for highly enthusiastic Senior Data Science Leaders to partner as part-time, contract interviewers for mock-interview sessions. This is an amazing opportunity to leverage your interview and industry expertise to help others reach their goals, network with (well prepared) active candidates, and earn significant income on the side.

After completing a thorough interview training session with one of our advisors, you will partner with a team of other experienced professionals to conduct comprehensive mock interviews for candidates looking to experience a Tier-1 style interview. You will provide detailed and targeted candidate feedback to help candidates identify and shore up areas of opportunity, gain confidence, and Epitomize Excellence ©.

Basic Qualifications:

3+ years hiring and managing team members

5+ years interviewing Data Science candidates at a successful company

10+ years in a Data Science role

Current or willingness to open an LLC / operate as a 1099 contractor, including providing a W9

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience conducting remote interviews

3+ years at a top tech / engineering company

A genuine passion for hiring, mentoring, and helping others

Compensation (contract) and Perks:

Monetary compensation:
$400 per 2-hour session + referral fee for every candidate you refer that completes a paid session

Flexible work schedule:
Work remotely and choose hours that align with your availability

Networking Opportunities:
You’ll be in constant communication with active job seekers and other professionals from around the country. Epitome actively encourages networking among partners and candidates. We just want to help!

Refine your own skills:
Improve your own interview skills through Epitome’s interview training and consistent practice

Unlimited income potential: There is no limit to the number of interview sessions in which you participate or referral bonuses you can earn.

Join Us!
If networking with active (highly prepared) candidates and professionals, mentoring, refining your own interviewing skills, and earning significant side-income sounds appealing, please apply!

Epitome Talent Advisors celebrates and encourages difference and diversity, recognizing the individual value each unique background can provide. As such, Epitome does not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy and gender identity), national origin, political affiliation, sexual orientation, marital status, disability, genetic information, age, membership in an employee organization, retaliation, parental status, military service, or other non-merit factor.

Job Types: Part-time, Contract

Pay: $200.00 per hour

Expected hours: 2 – 10 per week
